content: pretty in pink designed by mary ann kintner a crocheted fingerles glove perfect for any weather materials luster sheen or sport weight yarn---1 skien but have extra handy to make sure that you have enough size d/3 3 25mm crochet hook special stitches cluster cluster -work yo insert hook yo draw loop through yo draw through 2 loops over the number of stitches indicated yo draw through all loops on hook crossed double_crochet xs skip 1 stitch then work 1 double_crochet in the next stitch work double_crochet in stitch just skipped before making the first double_crochet beginning xs---after joining rounds with a slip st slip_stitch into next st and chain 3 double_crochet in the join slipped stitch you previously made---you will be doing this at the beginning of each round on the hand of the glove and also the thumb reverse single_crochet---working left to right insert hook in next stitch to the right complete as single_crochet you can find picture directions here if you need them---- http //crochet about com/library/weekly/aa12997 htm http //www youtube com/watch v=jhsbycwfpdo abbreviations used in pattern single_crochet-single_crochet tch-turning chain cluster-cluster xs-cross stitch rsc-reverse single_crochet double_crochet-double_crochet chain-chain space-space lp-loop tch-turning chain cluster-cluster xs-cross stitch rsc-reverse single_crochet cuff chain 49 the cuff will be crocheted back and forth in row 1st row-- right side 1 single_crochet into 2nd chain from hook *skip 3 chain 9 double_crochet into next chain skip 3 chain 1 single_crochet into next chain repeat from* to end turn 6 groups of 9 double_crochet 2nd row--ch3 counts as 1 double_crochet skip first st 1 cluster over next 4 sts *ch3 1 single_crochet into next st ch3 1 cluster over next 9 sts repeat from * ending last repeat with 1 cluster over last 5 sts skip tch turn 3rd row--ch3 counts as 2 double_crochet 4 double_crochet into first st *skip ch3 1 single_crochet into next single_crochet skip ch3 9 double_crochet into lp which closed next cluster repeat from * ending last repeat with 5 double_crochet into top of tch turn 4th row--1 chain 1 single_crochet into first st *ch3 1 cluster over next 9 sts ch3 1 single_crochet into next st repeat from * ending last repeat with 1 single_crochet into top of tch turn 5th row--1 chain 1 single_crochet into first st *skip ch3 9 double_crochet into lp which closed next cluster skip ch3 1 single_crochet into next single_crochet repeat from* to end skip tch finish off leaving a tail long enough to sew the ends together sew ends together hand you will work the hand in joining rounds 1st round--working on flat side of cuff beginning chain make 42 single_crochet join with slip_stitch do not turn 2nd round--slip_stitch into next st and make beginning xs work xs to end of row join with slip_stitch to top of beginning ch3 21 xs 3rd-7th rnds-- the number of row may be adjusted to fit your hand the thumb will follow these row work beginning xs work in xs pattern to end of row join 8th
